msg: in case modperl_mgv_resolve was called with logfailure=FALSE, we must not
croak on error and let the caller handle the situation

author: gozer
msg: Decided on leaving the generated include to make possible debugging easier,
and no harm is done, since it's going to be re-generated on each test run.

author: gozer
msg: Handle creation of the test Included <Perl> sections directly, without trying
to rely on A::T::*, simpler and avoids misleading diagnostic output
